sn45.161:1.6: Imasam kho, bhikkhave, tissannam esananam abhinnaya ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavetabbo.
sn45.161:1.8: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthim bhaveti vivekanissitam …pe… sammasamadhim bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn45.161:1.9: Imasam kho, bhikkhave, tissannam esananam abhinnaya ayam ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavetabboti.
sn45.161:2.5: Imasam kho, bhikkhave, tissannam esananam abhinnaya ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavetabbo.
sn45.161:2.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthim bhaveti …pe… sammasamadhim bhaveti ragavinayapariyosanam dosavinayapariyosanam mohavinayapariyosanam.
sn45.161:2.8: Imasam kho, bhikkhave, tissannam esananam abhinnaya ayam ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavetabboti.
sn45.161:3.5: Imasam kho, bhikkhave, tissannam esananam abhinnaya ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavetabbo.
sn45.161:3.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthim bhaveti …pe… sammasamadhim bhaveti amatogadham amataparayanam amatapariyosanam.
sn45.161:3.8: Imasam kho, bhikkhave, tissannam esananam abhinnaya ayam ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavetabboti.
sn45.161:4.5: Imasam kho, bhikkhave, tissannam esananam abhinnaya ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavetabbo.
sn45.161:4.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthim bhaveti …pe… sammasamadhim bhaveti nibbananinnam nibbanaponam nibbanapabbharam.
sn45.161:4.8: Imasam kho, bhikkhave, tissannam esananam abhinnaya ayam ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavetabboti.
sn45.161:5.5: Imasam kho, bhikkhave, tissannam esananam parinnaya …pe… ayam ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavetabboti.
sn45.161:6.5: Imasam kho, bhikkhave, tissannam esananam parikkhayaya …pe… ayam ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavetabboti.
sn45.161:7.5: Imasam kho, bhikkhave, tissannam esananam pahanaya ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavetabbo.
sn45.161:7.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthim bhaveti …pe… sammasamadhim bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim …
sn45.161:7.8: Imasam kho, bhikkhave, tissannam esananam pahanaya ayam ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavetabbo”ti.
